text: Bruck an der Mur is a town in Bruck-Mürzzuschlag in the Austrian state of Styria. About 15,000 people live there. It is at the confluence of the Mur and Mürz rivers. Bruck an der Mur is on the railway line between Graz and Vienna. Since 2015, Oberaich became a part of the municipality of Bruck an der Mur. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Settlements in Styria
title: Bruck an der Mur
